p: The findings of Figure 4 were further tested with statistical cross-comparisons of MPP vs meso MP vs genotype from multiple experiments and summarized in Table 3. IC 50 values for either CoPP or ZnPP across each genotype were not significantly different; however, CoPP was a better inhibitor than ZnPP for all genotypes (p < 0.05) ( Table 3A). In contrast, both ZnPP and SnPP were better inhibitors than their meso variants ( Table 3B). These comparisons emphasize the importance of the vinyl R group of the MPP for anti-protease activity.
